title: Connection Issues.
body:
League won't pass "authenticating.." Ran several speed tests and contacted IP, reset the router, ran windows diagnosis and full repair on the game.
screenshot related: 

 http://i67.tinypic.com/24pgu42.png

replies.body: Heya there were issues earlier with the server that included logging in.  Things should be okay now, but let me know if you run into any issue.
